findings.title: Centralized Control of State Variable
findings.description: Critical state variables can be updated any time by the controlling authorities without notifying the users.

findings.title: Insufficient Logging for Privileged Functions
findings.description: Privileged functions that are executable by the controlling parties are not logged properly by emitting events.

findings.title: Unused Function Parameter
findings.description: The addReward() function in PerformanceDistribution contract has an unused parameter lastUpdateBlock.

findings.title: Improper Function Visibility
findings.description: Functions with improper visibility can lead to unintended access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Code Improvement in _getPeriodTimes() Function
findings.description: Improper adherence to coding standards by using recursion in the _getPeriodTimes() function, which can be improved by calculating the value in one function call.

findings.title: Inexplicit Solidity Compiler Version
findings.description: The solidity compiler version of the Timelock contract is not explicitly stated and should be fixed to the latest stable version.
